com.ibm.jaggr.service.readers

Class CharacterEscapingReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Reader
      • java.io.FilterReader
        • java.io.PushbackReader
          • com.ibm.jaggr.service.readers.CharacterEscapingReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Readable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JavaScriptEscapingReader

    public class CharacterEscapingReader
extends PushbackReader
    A reader that will escape characters from another reader's stream by preceding them with a back slash '\' character.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CharacterEscapingReader(Reader in, Collection<Character> charsToEscape)
      Constructs a CharacterEscapingReader from an input reader and a collection of characters to escape.
